de.humatic.nmj
Class NetworkMidiPort

java.lang.Object
  de.humatic.nmj.NetworkMidiPort
Direct Known Subclasses:
NetworkMidiInput, NetworkMidiOutput
public class NetworkMidiPort
extends java.lang.Object

Baseclass for MIDI ports in nmj's public api. Not used when working with javax.sound.midi.
